content.text: Match ends, Barcelona B 1, Recreativo 1.
Second Half ends, Barcelona B 1, Recreativo 1.
Carles Planas (Barcelona B) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Juan Villar (Recreativo).
Attempt missed. Raúl Cámara (Recreativo) right footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the right.
Foul by Rubén Rochina (Barcelona B).
Andrés Lamas (Recreativo) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Marc Bartra (Barcelona B) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Rubén Rochina with a through ball following a set piece situation.
Attempt blocked. Rubén Rochina (Barcelona B) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt blocked. Rubén Rochina (Barcelona B) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Foul by Emilio Sánchez (Recreativo).
Rubén Rochina (Barcelona B) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Jordi Matamala (Recreativo) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.

Jonathan dos Santos (Barcelona B) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jordi Matamala (Recreativo).
Foul by Kepa (Recreativo).
Oriol Romeu (Barcelona B) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Second yellow card to Aarón Ñíguez (Recreativo) for excessive celebration.
Goal!  Barcelona B 1, Recreativo 1. Aarón Ñíguez (Recreativo) right footed shot from outside the box to the top right corner following a set piece situation.
Attempt blocked. Juan Villar (Recreativo) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt blocked. Emilio Sánchez (Recreativo) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Substitution, Recreativo. Kepa replaces Leandro Cabrera.

Substitution, Barcelona B. Rubén Rochina replaces Jonatan Soriano.
Corner,  Barcelona B. Conceded by Leandro Cabrera.
Attempt blocked. Nolito (Barcelona B) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is blocked. Assisted by Carlos Carmona.
Substitution, Barcelona B. Carles Planas replaces Marc Muniesa because of an injury.
Corner,  Recreativo. Conceded by Martín Montoya.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Marc Muniesa (Barcelona B) because of an injury.
Rafita went off injured after Recreativo had used all subs.
Corner,  Recreativo. Conceded by Armando Lozano.
Substitution, Recreativo. Emilio Sánchez replaces Dani.
Substitution, Barcelona B. Jonathan dos Santos replaces Víctor Vázquez.
Offside, Barcelona B. Nolito tries a through ball, but Jonatan Soriano is caught offside.

Aarón Ñíguez (Recreativo) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
